#summary ThunderBolt using ActionScript 2

= ThunderBolt AS2 =

=== Usage ===

Simply [http://flash-thunderbolt.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/source/ download the classes] and add `-trace ThunderBolt.trace` to the MTASC command line arguments.

=== Online Sample ===

_[http://flash-thunderbolt.googlecode.com/files/example.html See a sample application in action.]_

=== Download ===

You can download the [http://flash-thunderbolt.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/thunderbolt_classes.zip zipped ActionScript Package] or access the [http://code.google.com/p/flash-thunderbolt/source subversion source].

|| `fullClass` || `my.package.MyClass` ||

|| `method` || `myMethod` ||
|| `time` || `18:59:59` ||
|| `type` || `string`  ||

=== Log Levels===

By passing an extra literal to your `trace` actions, you can achieve multiple debug levels.

|| d || debug || `trace('d This is a simple debug message.');` ||
|| i || info  || `trace('i An info icon will appear next to this line.');` ||
|| w || warn  || `trace('w This message is highlighted.');` ||
|| e || error || `trace('e Red and highlited messages.');` ||


=== Debug in Browser ===

Run this two commands to get more information on your objects during runtime:

{{{
TB.inspect(target);

TB.inspect('_root'); // _root [movieclip]
TB.inspect('_root.$version'); // WIN 9,0,28,0
}}}

{{{
TB.set(target, value);

TB.set('_root.main._x', 50);
TB.set('_root.main.infoText.text', 'New Mssage');
}}}

{{{
TB.cd(newContext);

TB.cd('_root.main.head'); // set new context
TB.inspect('_y'); // y position of current content (head)
TB.cd('..'); // select parent movieclip (main)
}}}
